Articles.Content: I hate to do this to you, as I do understand this is the most annoying kind of message to get for a mod maker, but as I literally can't off Eve without your help I feel the need to ask if you have an ETA for the next update for this mod? Please?

>

> I hate to do this to you, as I do understand this is the most annoying kind of message to get for a mod maker, but as I literally can't off Eve without your help I feel the need to ask if you have an ETA for the next update for this mod? Please?
> 

I think it's a worthwhile question by now. I certainly know [@JoePatrick](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/94207-joepatrick/) knows I will need this mod for KSA in v1.3.x ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P") But I'm still waiting on 5 other mods to update so haven't bugged him about it yet

**Here's an update for you all**

Before July I was unable to work on my mods due to exams, they've since finished so I now have the time to work on them.

I've recently been working on other stuff ([this for example](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q8iSbFz8sEE), if people are interested) but I'm gonna spend some time on KerBalloons next.

I am going away for 2 weeks on 25th July, I will get a 1.3 patch out before then and when I get back I'll carry on with working on the new stuff (like hover mode and Jool balloons)

I'll try to keep you all updated, my [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXydzUz46ejjK8zzF_M60-g) channel will probably have a few videos going up of the new features as I test them - I'll try to remember to link them here as well

Thanks for all your patience ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

edit:  

Okay so **I've got it working in 1.3**, the issue was that squad changed the way part categories load slightly,  

I haven't done a full test of every balloon from surface to burst altitude but it all seems to work as it before, if you find any issues let me know  

The update is uploaded and pending approval, I'll post when it's available - usually within an hour or so, sometimes more, sometimes less

I'm finally jumping over to v1.3.1 and took a look at this - it's the same problem as Kerbalism and other mods from v1.3 that used custom categories - they won't show up anymore in v1.3.1. Here's a <abbr title="Module Manager (mod)">MM</abbr> patch that will place everything in the Science tab - at some point I may do a CCK patch too but for now this'll do. Basic testing shows the balloons still work once you can find the parts to build something with them.

    @PART[*Balloon*]:NEEDS[KerBalloons]:FINAL { @category = Science }

Still, hope [@JoePatrick1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/104094-joepatrick1/) is able to come back and do a proper update at some point - would very much like the hover features!
